channel.title: CVE Feed for Themeum -- Tutor LMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Themeum -- Tutor LMS

item.title: CVE-2023-25800|2023-11-03T16:26:12.916Z -- themeum -- tutor%20lms
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Themeum Tutor LMS allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Tutor LMS: from n/a through 2.2.0.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Themeum Tutor LMS allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Tutor LMS: from n/a through 2.1.10.

item.title: CVE-2023-25799|2024-06-11T09:15:01.315Z -- themeum -- tutor%20lms
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Themeum Tutor LMS.This issue affects Tutor LMS: from n/a through 2.1.8.
